author: zeus.eth
content: I just want to throw out some good vibes and say thank you all for the work you put into this space!

author: veganbootyeater69
content: hi! how often are the dev merge calls in here?

author: m.kalinin
content: There are two fortnightly calls: ACD and Consensus-layer call that are happening on different weeks. These two calls is where the dev merge discussion is currently happening. Look into issues here for more detail https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/

author: paulhauner
content:
FYI I am proposing a change to the beacon-APIs that prevents attestations, aggregate attestations and sync committee contributions from being returned from the BN API if they refer to an optimistic block. I suspect other implementations might already be doing this:

https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/pull/216

author: yorickdowne
content: That's best discussed with the Prysm team and giving them debug logs. We've seen something similar in a partition test.

author: atif4088
content: i have not checked the balance. As no validator could not finalise epoch, so everyone would suffer inactivity penalties.

author: trent_vanepps
content:
we're planning the next Merge Community call for June 3 - 1400 UTC (10 EST).

it would be great to have at least one contributor for each client (EL + CL) + a few researchers be present to field questions. DM me your email address if you'd like to join, and i can add you to the calendar invite

https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/532
